examples.example: 有些困难只是暂时的，我们要积极面对并努力克服。

translate.english: Some difficulties are only temporary, and we should face them actively and strive to overcome them.

examples.example: 有些梦想看似遥远，但只要我们坚持不懈地努力，就有可能实现。

translate.english: Some dreams seem far away, but as long as we keep working hard unremittingly, they may come true.

examples.example: 有些挫折会让我们变得更加坚强和成熟。

translate.english: Some setbacks will make us become stronger and more mature.
